title: Did this photo present Honduran caravan members using the United States Red Cross tent?
subtitle: A picture of a family living in front of a tent named the Mexican Cruz Roja was presented as evidence that the United States Red Cross had fled the tents of a convoy.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: A photograph of a family of Honduran convoy members who settle in front of a tent provided by the United States Red Cross is available.
